name: Roland L. KELLER, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Dorothy M. Mondell, Deceased, Appellee, v. J. Richard WIDMAN, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Roland L. KELLER, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Dorothy M. Mondell, Deceased, Appellee, v. J. Richard WIDMAN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert A. Seiferth, Williamsport, for appellant.
Peter T. Campana, Williamsport, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
527 A.2d 1008
Roland L. KELLER, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Dorothy M. Mondell, Deceased, Appellee, v. J. Richard WIDMAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 2, 1986.
Decided July 9, 1987.
Robert A. Seiferth, Williamsport, for appellant.
Peter T. Campana, Williamsport, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
